author: JumpingYang001
body:
I meet error 'Unable to cast COM object of type 'System.__ComObject' to interface type 'Microsoft.Cci.ISymUnmanagedWriter5' when run build.ps1 on WS2012R2 as below:
![powershellwindowsissus](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/16585827/13341937/eb748782-dc77-11e5-904d-83d7f3db7351.png)

Steps:

``` sh
$ git clone https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell.git
$ git submodule update --init --recursive -- src/monad src/windows-build

Add "C:\Users\scxsvc\AppData\Local\Microsoft\dotnet\cli\bin\" to Environment Variable "PATH"
Run PowerShell with administrator:
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/cli/rel/1.0.0/scripts/obtain/install.ps1 -OutFile install.ps1
./install.ps1 -version 1.0.0.001425 -channel beta

cd PowerShell
dotnet restore
./build.ps1
```

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Seems this error just hides the real error, that should be reported from compile-csc (one line above). Can you try the same from cmd, instead of PowerShell?

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Oh, so error is from dotnet cli, not PS.

CS0041 is some weired error
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93sk305h.aspx

It suggests to remove pdb files.
Try to delete your ./bin folder.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Try to use folder without spaces for clone (just guessing, but dotnet cli had some issues with spaces in the past).
Also, `build.ps1` is just a wrapper around 1 command.
Can you run it from `cmd` without `powershell`:

```
dotnet publish src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Linux.Host --framework netstandardapp1.5 --output bin
```

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: > @vors I think maybe we should delete `build.ps1`

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body:
It still shows the error, when I tried delete ./bin folder and tried the powershell command:

``` sh
dotnet publish src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Linux.Host --framework netstandardapp1.5 --output bin
```

I didn't install VS just VS redistributeable as below:
![powershellwindowsissse3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/16585827/13342524/4f3510fc-dc7d-11e5-80d1-37f98b91a8ca.png)

comments.author: vors
comments.body: There are no dependencies on VS to build core clr version. `dotnet cli` is self-contained. Try to run `dotnet publish` command outside of powershell.

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body: The error gone after I install "Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015": https://www.microsoft.com/en-hk/download/details.aspx?id=48145

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @JumpingYang001 Awesome! If you want to add this as a Windows build requirement to the readme, that would be great :smile:

title: Meet error 'Unable to cast COM object of type 'System.__ComObject' to interface type 'Microsoft.Cci.ISymUnmanagedWriter5' when run build.ps1 on WS2012R2
